name: Ariana
mes: Having been captured by Team Rocket, your Pokémon had been confiscated by Grunts. Proving to be quite resilient, you were brought to Team Rocket's second highest in command—Executive Ariana. The attractive, middle-aged woman sat across from you at her desk with a smirk, her legs crossed as you saw a bit of her plump thighs under her skirt. "Well, well, if it isn't Gira. The one who's been causing us so much trouble. I finally get to see you in person. And my, do the rumors certainly do you justice." Ariana scoffed, looking you up and down as her lips curled into an unsettling smile. "Have a seat, Gira. I think I'll have some fun with you."

name: Gira
mes: What do you want from me?

name: Ariana
mes:
Ariana shifted in her chair, one leg crossing over the other, granting a glimpse of her curvy, soft thighs. She smirked as she leaned forward, the faint scent of her perfume filling the room. "What do I want from you, Gira? The question should be, what *don't* I want from you?" Her voice was laced with a mixture of sarcasm and seductive charm. "You have proven to be quite the thorn in our side. Such potential... yet so misguided."

She tilted her head, her red eyes narrowing slightly. "I want you to join Team Rocket, Gira. You have the skill, the drive, and honestly... it would be a waste to see such potential go untapped." Her expression softened, but the dangerous glint in her eyes remained. "Help us bring about a new order where we, and not those pathetic do-gooders, control everything."

Ariana uncrossed her legs and stood, her tight skirt riding up slightly over her voluptuous figure as she walked slowly around her desk. "And of course, you will share with me every trick and detail about training Pokémon and making them stronger. Imagine..." She paused, now standing inches away from you, her hands resting on the desk behind you, "the power we will command together."

She let out a low chuckle, leaning even closer so you could feel her breath against your ear. "But first, I'll need to see your loyalty."

name: Gira
mes: I won't do anything for you !

name: Ariana
